storyInfo: From inside her locked door, the Manticore girl who arrived at Rhodes Island by accident does not say a word, but listens closely to the conversations that take place outside.

attributes.content: Rhodes Island Command Center
I'm sorry. I shouldn't have brought her back.
attributes.name: Stormeye

attributes.content: Help me understand what happened.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: As I stated in the report, she was unconscious near the safe house, barely clinging to life. She was covered in dust and sand, looking just like a desert Catastrophe victim.
attributes.name: Stormeye

attributes.content: I wanted to give her a sip of water. A bit of the old habit came out.
attributes.name: Stormeye

attributes.content: There's nothing wrong with the compassion to help those in need, as long as you can handle the responsibilities that come with it.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I'll admit, I did not fully consider who she might be.
attributes.name: Stormeye

attributes.content: I gave her a little salt water and left her in the shade near the village.
attributes.name: Stormeye

attributes.content: The next time I saw her, she was on the aircraft.
attributes.name: Stormeye

attributes.content: Obviously, she followed me.
attributes.name: Stormeye

attributes.content: And you said you didn't notice anything at the time, correct?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I performed a comprehensive cabin inspection, and didn't see anything out of the ordinary.
attributes.name: Stormeye

attributes.content: She suddenly appeared in the middle of the journey, and I can't even confirm that she had been hiding inside the aircraft.
attributes.name: Stormeye

attributes.content: If not for her poor physical condition at the time, she might've even hit me with that attack.
attributes.name: Stormeye

attributes.content: According to our analyses, she possesses some form of invisibility-type Originium Arts. If you can provide any further details, we'll have an easier time handling her.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I'm sorry, Dr. Kal'tsit. I honestly don't have anything else to offer.
attributes.name: Stormeye

attributes.content: She didn't even leave footprints in the sand.
attributes.name: Stormeye

attributes.content: That could also be useful information.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Can you think of any reasons she might've had for attacking you?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I'm thinking it might've been an old grudge, or a simple misunderstanding. It might've even been a stress response after crossing the desert.
attributes.name: Stormeye

attributes.options: Or maybe it's because you saw her.

attributes.content: That's crossed my mind as well.
attributes.name: Stormeye

attributes.content: Rhodes Island will continue to investigate her, but some answers may have to come straight from the girl's mouth.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Just so you feel better, Stormeye, she hasn't hurt anyone since coming to Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: She allowed us to examine her, but while we were administering an IV, she pulled the needle out and left Medical. She's been placed in a single dorm since then.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: From the data we've gotten back from her infection monitoring device, her life isn't in imminent danger.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: However, she refuses to communicate with us.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Okay.
attributes.name: Stormeye

attributes.content: Now then, the next matter is yours, {@nickname}.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: We tried to identify the ID cards she had on her person, but most of them are older than her – remnants from a regional conflict decades ago.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: All we can tell from them is she has been active throughout most of Sargon. Beyond that, there's no deeper connection among those IDs.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The other angle of investigation arises from the weapon she was carrying. We can fairly conclusively say that her primary function mode is assassination.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: She carried several small and delicate devices with a level of craftsmanship unlikely to be self-made.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But, Rhodes Island has no way to trace the weapons and poisons. Our intelligence networks have come up completely blank.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Similarly, assassinations are not uncommon in Sargon, so we can't link her activities with any specific event.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Finally, judging from her behavior since coming in contact with Rhodes Island, it might be difficult to get any information directly from her.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: She has been awake for three days, but has continued to refuse the food and water we've provided.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: If she's so fiercely loyal to her past, can we really reach a cooperative relationship with her?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: ––These are things for you to decide, {@nickname}. If you have time, you can go see her.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: For Rhodes Island, she is an Infected first and foremost, and that has nothing to do with her past.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: If she is willing to cooperate, then we can accept her.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Same rules as always. Spin the bottle.
attributes.name: Person in a White Mask

attributes.content: Whoever the bottle points to takes the job.
attributes.name: Person in a White Mask

attributes.content: Everyone quietly gathers in a circle. The bottle spins with no regard for who it chooses. They're all the same.
The mouth of the bottle stops in front of her. She takes the note from inside, and leaves the group.
The orders are inside the bottle, on the slip of paper.
attributes.name: Person in a White Mask

attributes.content: The group leader always repeats these words, as if tacitly acknowledging the presence of newcomers.
But she doesn't keep track of the comings and goings. Sometimes three or four show up. Other times, there might be as many as a dozen.
She reckons that the group leader probably doesn't keep track either, because the voice behind the white mask has changed as well.
Haah......
attributes.name: Panicked Manticore Girl

attributes.content: (That was a close one... I almost fell asleep again...)
attributes.name: Panicked Manticore Girl

attributes.content: (Nnh... What am I wearing? The texture feels so weird...)
attributes.name: Panicked Manticore Girl

attributes.content: I haven't seen a Manticore in years! The girl won't come out?
attributes.name: Voice Outside the Door A

attributes.content: (The observers are coming...)
attributes.name: Panicked Manticore Girl

attributes.content: Please calm down, Dr. Warfarin. If you shackle her to... Err, invite her to your operating table, you might stir up some repressed psychological trauma in that child.
attributes.name: Voice Outside the Door B

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Voice Outside the Door A

attributes.content: Then what does Kal'tsit plan to do? We might have the most advanced medical technology, but we can't treat patients through a door.
attributes.name: Voice Outside the Door A

attributes.content: Dr. Kal'tsit said to give her some more time... If she doesn't want to open the door, we can't force her.
attributes.name: Voice Outside the Door B

attributes.content: Right, I found an old uniform jacket for her. There's no way she can wear whatever she had on before.
attributes.name: Voice Outside the Door B

attributes.content: She looked a lot more energetic after getting her out of those gritty, blood-soaked rags.
attributes.name: Voice Outside the Door B

attributes.content: Don't worry too much. Your subject... Err, I mean, your patient, should recover soon enough.
attributes.name: Voice Outside the Door B

attributes.content: It's quiet again.
attributes.name: Panicked Manticore Girl

attributes.content: Are the observers gone?
attributes.name: Panicked Manticore Girl

attributes.content: They know... I'm an Infected.
attributes.name: Panicked Manticore Girl

attributes.content: They are waiting for me to give in... Using treatment as a bait... to trick me into giving in.
attributes.name: Panicked Manticore Girl

attributes.content: Ugh!
attributes.name: Panicked Manticore Girl

attributes.content: You can't touch it... Even if it's inside me, I can press down hard until it hurts, but I can't feel the Originium.
attributes.name: Panicked Manticore Girl

attributes.content: So, if they know I'm an Infected, they must know who I am.
attributes.name: Panicked Manticore Girl

attributes.content: Has my cover been blown? I failed to kill that soldier...
attributes.name: Panicked Manticore Girl

attributes.content: They're testing me... They want to know if I can still be used.
attributes.name: Panicked Manticore Girl

attributes.content: That would be great. It's been so, so long since I've gotten orders.
attributes.name: Panicked Manticore Girl

attributes.content: I will prove myself.
attributes.name: Panicked Manticore Girl

attributes.content: There's a strange restraint on my leg. It looks like tech that only a nomadic city would have.
attributes.name: Panicked Manticore Girl

attributes.content: There are soft beds here too... and no sand stuck between the cracks of the walls.
attributes.name: Panicked Manticore Girl

attributes.content: Just like living in Dreamland... Could I be in the same place as that Padishah?
attributes.name: Panicked Manticore Girl

attributes.content: Excuse me, how are you doing? Are you still sleeping?
attributes.name: Voice Outside the Door A

attributes.content: I know... if you're starving, you can't eat a whole bunch of food in one sitting. So, I made some very light porridge for you.
attributes.name: Voice Outside the Door A

attributes.content: Still asleep, huh? Well, I'll slide it through the little window here.
attributes.name: Voice Outside the Door A

attributes.content: Oh hey there, Gummy. Are you in charge of breakfast today? I would've been out of bed at the crack of dawn, if I knew.
attributes.name: Voice Outside the Door B

attributes.content: Oh, did you come to visit the new girl too? I was gonna ask if she wanted to put together a manicure set with me, but she never showed up.
attributes.name: Voice Outside the Door B

attributes.content: The folks from Medical told me she needs to rest up, and that I shouldn't go bothering her.
attributes.name: Voice Outside the Door A

attributes.content: It's not like I'm going door to door selling stuff. I just wanted to see if she felt like getting some fresh air.
attributes.name: Voice Outside the Door B

attributes.content: I finally found someone who'd look great with blue nail polish. I'm not gonna let this opportunity slide by!
attributes.name: Voice Outside the Door B

attributes.content: Err, Utage... You don't need to get so fired up over that kind of stuff.
attributes.name: Voice Outside the Door A

attributes.content: (They're calling each other by name... It doesn't seem scripted.)
attributes.name: Panicked Manticore Girl

attributes.content: (In other words, the ones who captured me... are enemies.)
attributes.name: Panicked Manticore Girl

attributes.content: (They confiscated my weapons... There's no sharp furniture here either.)
attributes.name: Panicked Manticore Girl

attributes.content: (They're getting ready to interrogate me, and... they don't plan on letting me escape before they do.)
attributes.name: Panicked Manticore Girl

attributes.content: (And a lot of people here have seen me... I'm already useless.)
attributes.name: Panicked Manticore Girl

attributes.content: (But it's okay. This was bound to happen one day.)
attributes.name: Panicked Manticore Girl

attributes.content: Oh right, did she not touch the plates we brought her yesterday and the day before?
attributes.name: Voice Outside the Door A

attributes.content: Seems like it. Is she like those Vouivres who can just eat or not eat whenever they want?
attributes.name: Voice Outside the Door B

attributes.content: No clue... Isn't going hungry super sad though? Plus, all that food is going to waste.
attributes.name: Voice Outside the Door A

attributes.content: Well, whatever. Sounds like our new friend is still sleeping, so let's not bother her.
attributes.name: Voice Outside the Door A

attributes.content: They're gone.
attributes.name: Panicked Manticore Girl

attributes.content: Did they really... say all those things so I could hear them?
attributes.name: Panicked Manticore Girl

attributes.content: Doctor, I never knew you had the time to come to the operator dorms.
attributes.name: Ansel

attributes.content: Whenever I pass by your office, I can tell you're totally swamped with operation materials and paperwork.
attributes.name: Ansel

attributes.options: Kal'tsit suggested I come visit her when I could.;I want to see how she's doing.;Getting up to walk around is part of my exercise routine.

attributes.content: So Dr. Kal'tsit told you the same, eh?
attributes.name: Ansel

attributes.content: Ah, that's right. Ever since Medical took in the Manticore girl, everyone's been looking after her.
attributes.name: Ansel

attributes.content: I'm glad you've taken my advice to heart, but I'm afraid that just walking around isn't enough.
attributes.name: Ansel

attributes.content: Oh, but let's talk about the Manticore girl first.
attributes.name: Ansel

attributes.content: We medics all want to help her.
attributes.name: Ansel

attributes.content: Even though her infection has already developed to an intermediate stage, with Rhodes Island's current technology, we can get it under control to prevent further deterioration.
attributes.name: Ansel

attributes.content: The data collected from the infection monitoring device shows that the Originium crystals inside her are now quite active, and it doesn't help that she's weak from refusing to eat.
attributes.name: Ansel

attributes.content: None of us want to see our patients consume themselves like this.
attributes.name: Ansel

attributes.content: But if I was suddenly taken to a strange new environment, and found myself lying on an operating table first thing after waking up, I'd be plenty scared too.
attributes.name: Ansel

attributes.content: So, uh, I brought one of Hibiscus's healthy meals with me and planned on saying hi to her first, just as a token of our good will.
attributes.name: Ansel

attributes.content: Do you have any ideas, Doctor?
attributes.name: Ansel

attributes.options: Tell her Rhodes Island can protect her.;That health food is the opposite of good will.;Tell her Rhodes Island needs her skills.

attributes.content: Protect? Doctor, do you mean to say... She's not just afraid because we're a strange new place?
attributes.name: Ansel

attributes.content: Right, maybe she's also scared of her Oripathy. As a medic, I can guarantee that her life won't be in any danger.
attributes.name: Ansel

attributes.content: Yeah, you have a point, Doctor. Healthy meals primarily incorporate cold foods, which may not sit well with someone who hasn't eaten in days, or be digestible enough to give her energy.
attributes.name: Ansel

attributes.content: Eh? Doctor, are you saying she can become a reserve operator?
attributes.name: Ansel

attributes.content: To be honest, if I encountered an invisible enemy during a training exercise, I'd be pretty nervous myself, haha...
attributes.name: Ansel

attributes.content: Phew. With you here, I always feel like we have a better chance of persuading the other party.
attributes.name: Ansel

attributes.options: Oh right, and try not to be too graphic when describing what we do.;You can share with her why you trust Rhodes Island.

attributes.content: Makes sense.
attributes.name: Ansel

attributes.content: To be honest, as a reserve operator, I don't actually know what hellish battles you and the regulars have had to endure.
attributes.name: Ansel

attributes.content: But so many patients have told me... that you saved them.
attributes.name: Ansel

attributes.content: Me? I trust in Rhodes Island's determination to find a cure for Oripathy, and I deeply admire Dr. Kal'tsit's knowledge and ability.
attributes.name: Ansel

attributes.content: And when I'm tending to the wounded in a dangerous operation, I have full faith that you'll be in firm control of the situation so I don't have to focus on anything but my responsibilities as a medic operator.
attributes.name: Ansel

attributes.content: That's probably what I'd tell her.
attributes.name: Ansel

attributes.content: Doctor, did you want to come along with me?
attributes.name: Ansel

attributes.content: How long have you been hiding in here?
attributes.name: Person in a White Mask

attributes.content: Eek!
attributes.name: Panicked Manticore Girl

attributes.content: You're too weak to kill a single beast to even feed yourself anymore?
attributes.name: Person in a White Mask

attributes.content: I... I don't want to be like this either... I'm not hiding on purpose. It's just that, nobody can see me...
attributes.name: Panicked Manticore Girl

attributes.content: I... have no weapons. I've never touched a weapon...
attributes.name: Panicked Manticore Girl

attributes.content: You were born a weapon.
attributes.name: Person in a White Mask

attributes.content: I've always been very careful... My tail has never hurt anyone!
attributes.name: Panicked Manticore Girl

attributes.content: Who are you trying to deceive by feigning weakness? You no longer have an audience.
attributes.name: Person in a White Mask

attributes.content: Your Oripathy has progressed to this stage. Do you still think you can stay in the market as always, earning your next meal from somebody else's hands?
attributes.name: Person in a White Mask

attributes.content: H-How do you know... Who are you?
attributes.name: Panicked Manticore Girl

attributes.content: You should know this well enough. There's no place for you in your old life.
attributes.name: Person in a White Mask

attributes.content: You must learn to wield a weapon. This is the only worth you now have.
attributes.name: Person in a White Mask

attributes.content: No... I won't...
attributes.name: Panicked Manticore Girl

attributes.content: Look, this is a painkiller for Oripathy.
attributes.name: Person in a White Mask

attributes.content: You want to live, right?
attributes.name: Person in a White Mask

attributes.content: My team happens to have a spot for monsters like you.
attributes.name: Person in a White Mask

attributes.content: Join us. The leader will save you.
attributes.name: Person in a White Mask

attributes.content: Ugh...
attributes.name: Panicked Manticore Girl

attributes.content: The familiar pangs of hunger, the sensation of her consciousness withering away due to dehydration.
These things will sometimes happen in this stalking crouch. She is capable of judging her own body's state, and if she's on the job, she won't lose control.
However, every job she's had in the past specified a rendezvous point. As long as she could reach it, she'd have a chance to rest.
There's nothing on the note this time...
attributes.name: Panicked Manticore Girl

attributes.content: Ah... Even though I'm obviously useless now, I still want to be saved...
attributes.name: Panicked Manticore Girl

attributes.content: Even though I already knew... that the leader was lying...
attributes.name: Panicked Manticore Girl

attributes.content: Hello...?
attributes.name: Voice Outside the Door

attributes.content: Hello, my name is Ansel.
attributes.name: Ansel

attributes.content: I'm sorry, but I don't know what to call you. But here at Rhodes Island, there are a lot of people who don't want to disclose their real names, so they go by codenames. You can choose one for yourself.
attributes.name: Ansel

attributes.content: (They keep talking about this 'Rhodes Island.' Where is Rhodes Island?)
attributes.name: Panicked Manticore Girl

attributes.content: (The same thing is written on these clothes...)
attributes.name: Panicked Manticore Girl

attributes.content: I completely understand... When you woke up, you found yourself in a strange new place. You must be very nervous. I just want to tell you we don't have any ill will towards you.
attributes.name: Ansel

attributes.content: Um... I was one of the assistants standing to the side taking notes, so I hope you don't take this the wrong way.
attributes.name: Ansel

attributes.content: We are a non-state affiliated pharmaceutical company that hopes to help all Infected people across Terra.
attributes.name: Ansel

attributes.content: Even though you didn't come to Rhodes Island voluntarily, and were brought here by accident, you were in very poor physical condition at the time, and we examined you as part of our duties as medics.
attributes.name: Ansel

attributes.content: (He referred to this place as a pharmaceutical company... Is it a Columbian company?)
attributes.name: Panicked Manticore Girl

attributes.content: We really do want to help you... But if you don't want our help, we won't force you either.
attributes.name: Ansel

attributes.content: Oh, but, Rhodes Island is well outside Sargon's borders right now.
attributes.name: Ansel

attributes.content: (Outside... Sargon?)
attributes.name: Panicked Manticore Girl

attributes.content: If you wanted to go back, we wouldn't be able to let you off the ship until the next time we docked at a nomadic city. After that, you'd have to find your own way back.
attributes.name: Ansel

attributes.content: Of course, it'd be ideal if you chose to stay with us. Oh, and uh, our medical examination won't intrude on your privacy.
attributes.name: Ansel

attributes.content: Also, someone should've already introduced you to the Doctor, right?
attributes.name: Ansel

attributes.content: (The Doctor... I keep hearing this title...)
attributes.name: Panicked Manticore Girl

attributes.content: The Doctor says your skills will be useful to us.
attributes.name: Ansel

attributes.content: Because the situations surrounding the Infected can be rather dire, when we try to extend a helping hand to them, we inevitably run into conflicts with other people.
attributes.name: Ansel

attributes.content: So, we are in need of partners who are able and willing to fight to protect others.
attributes.name: Ansel

attributes.content: (He said 'need'... Does that mean I can still be useful?)
attributes.name: Panicked Manticore Girl

attributes.content: Oh, but don't let that scare you. You'll probably just be a reserve operator like me.
attributes.name: Ansel

attributes.content: And all the regular operators talk about the Doctor's reliable command.
attributes.name: Ansel

attributes.content: Plenty of regulars come back from life-or-death situations to tell me the Doctor was the one who saved them.
attributes.name: Ansel

attributes.content: (Really?)
attributes.name: Panicked Manticore Girl

attributes.content: (They won't send me to die?)
attributes.name: Panicked Manticore Girl

attributes.content: (*Softly clears throat*) ...H-Hello.
attributes.name: Panicked Manticore Girl

attributes.content: Doctor, she doesn't seem to be responding. Do you need to get back to work?
attributes.name: Ansel

attributes.content: No, p-please wait...
attributes.name: Panicked Manticore Girl

attributes.content: I can't hear anything from inside. She might still be sleeping.
attributes.name: Ansel

attributes.content: Don't go... I have to prove myself...
attributes.name: Panicked Manticore Girl

attributes.content: Commander, please don't leave me...
attributes.name: Panicked Manticore Girl

attributes.content: I am worried about her, but I suppose we also shouldn't bother her too much.
attributes.name: Ansel

attributes.content: I'm right here... Please notice me...
attributes.name: Panicked Manticore Girl

attributes.content: I want to live...
attributes.name: Panicked Manticore Girl

attributes.options: The door seems to sway, ever so slightly.;I think she's listening.
If you don't know how to answer, you can give me a codename first.;What would you like me to call you?
(Pass your notepad and pencil through the door.)

attributes.content: You're right, Doctor. For the operators of Rhodes Island, a raid of this sort would not be impossible.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: I also agree with putting some less-experienced operators into this drill. So they won't be completely caught off guard when encountering invisible enemies on the battlefield.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: But there is one problem: we don't know anything about this assassin who goes by 'Manticore.'
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: You can't let her scribbles on a single piece of paper replace the formal application process, let alone serve as an application to participate in a combat exercise.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: She still hasn't talked about her past, and the only information we have on her background is still vague.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.options: That's exactly why we can trust her.

attributes.content: Are you saying that once we win her over, she'll never betray–– I see now.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: But first, how will Rhodes Island win her over?
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: When our operators have the ability to defend against her attacks, or even counter them, this mock battle will instead have the effect of demonstrating Rhodes Island's sincerity to her.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Just like how an assassin places a knife by the monarch's pillow to let the opposition know she has the ability to strike at any time, but simply chooses not to.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: She should be able to get our meaning.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Fine. I accept your proposal.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: I'll arrange for a video recording of this exercise, to keep as part of her files.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Doctor, I trust you'll be able to get exactly what we need.
attributes.name: Dobermann
